title: How to Create a Deceased Patient File
body:
Submitting a patient as deceased can be easily updated in the Patients Profile:
Go on To Patient Profile
Select Details, then Demographics
Input the Date of Death, then Click save.
Now you have successfully updated the Patient as Deceased on the Patient File

Please note that once a patient is deemed as deceased you will not be able to add notes, however, there are alternatives to adding information to a patient profile. If you would like to know how please click here:  Why can't I Add Notes to a Deceased Patient?
